episodes.title: Crime and Punishment Ep. 4 We Join a Cult?!
episodes.description: Kaitlyn Barksdale, a history buff, and Sarah Taylor, a crime junkie, talk about the phenomenon that swept across the country in the 80s - the Satanic Panic. Both girls picked a different cult case to talk about this week - The Son of Sam and The Fall River Cult. Join the girls in this deep dive and find out what really goes down in a cult!
